MESSAGING

BANNERS

Invalid: Please check the information that you provided and try again.
Information: For easier payment, offer customer Text2Confirm option.
Payment Received: Your payment was successfully processed for the order.
Update: Application will be down during this weekend for an update. 
<div class="banner error">
    <span class="message">Invalid: Please check the information that you provided and try again.</span>
    <span class="close"></span>
</div>

    <span class="message">Information: For easier payment, offer customer Text2Confirm option.</span>
    <span class="close"></span>
</div>

    <span class="message">Payment Received: Your payment was successfully processed for the order.</span>
    <span class="close"></span>
</div>

MODALS

Modal Title
Sample modal content can be text or HTML.
Action 
<!-- HTML SNIPPET -->
<div class="card modal" id="modalID">
    <div class="card-toolbar">
        <span class="card-title">
            <h2>Modal Title</h2>
        </span>
        <i class="icon_close"></i>
    </div>
    <div class="card-content">
        Sample modal content can be text or HTML.
    </div>
    <div class="card-actions right">
        <a class="button primary" onclick="myModal.close()">Action</a>
    </div>
</div>
	
/* JAVASCRIPT SNIPPET */
// Callback function for when the modal is closed (OPTIONAL)
var callback = function() {
	console.log('Perform actions here'):
};

// Create Modal via ID
var myModal = new Modal('modalID');

// Initialize Modal (w/ optional callback)
myModal.init(callback);

// Function to open modal
myModal.open();

// Function to close modal
myModal.close();
